title: Google Ads Specialists
salary: 3-5$/ Hour USD or more depending on success
job_overview:
I’m looking for a highly motivated and experienced Google Ads & PPC expert to join our team part-time. My company, SmartHubb, builds high-converting websites, runs local SEO campaigns, manages Google Ads, and sets up smart systems to help service businesses grow online.

We work with local businesses across the U.S. — plumbers, dentists, roofers, lawyers, landscapers, and more. You’ll be responsible for launching and managing Google Ads campaigns, creating landing pages in WordPress, and setting up basic automations in GoHighLevel to drive leads and results for our clients.

We are Looking For Someone with proven experience running Google Ads. Someone that Can create high performing landing pages on Wordpress, someone with a basic knowledge of gohighlevel and someone that is Detail-oriented, organized, dependable and can drive real results!!

If you are interested, please send us your resume, let us know why you would be perfect for this role and include #google-ads in your email subject line.
